CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 4, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Chic Models And Dancer - Three of the outstanding participants in last week's twelfth annual Beauty Shop Owner fashion revue were Gloria Grate, fascinating young beautician, left; delightful young Yvonne Jones, dancer par excellence, and Maxine Drake, former Clevelander, whose flair for modeling reached a new high that night. Held in Fort Pitt Hotel, the revue, buffet and dancing party entertained more than five hundred guests. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Full-length portrait of Gloria Golden Grate wearing light-colored suit, fur stole, hat with short netting, and holding gloves and purse, posed in front of dark curtain, in Harris Studio
